text: Limkheda assembly constituency () is one of the 182 assembly constituencies of Gujarat. It is located in Dahod district. This seat is reserved for members of Scheduled Tribes. ==List of segments== This assembly seat represents the following segments:This assembly seat represents the following segments, # Limkheda Taluka ==Total Number of Voters== http://ceo.gujarat.gov.in/download/PCAC.pdf {| class="wikitable" |- !
